title: LUFF BAR TT9000 5pk
description: LUFF BAR TT9000  18mL Pre-Filled E-Liquid: This indicates that the device comes pre-filled with 18mL of e-liquid. Once the e-liquid is depleted, the device is typically disposed of. 5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength: The nicotine strength of 5% (50mg) indicates a relatively high concentration of nicotine in the e-liquid. It is important to be mindful of the nicotine content and use it responsibly. 550mAh Type-C Rechargeable Battery: The device is equipped with a 550mAh battery, which is rechargeable using a Type-C USB cable. This allows you to recharge the battery when it runs low. Approximately 9000 Puffs: The device is advertised to provide approximately 9000 puffs. It's worth noting that the actual number of puffs you get may vary based on usage patterns and individual vaping habits. Digital Battery & E-Liquid Display Screen: The presence of a digital display screen indicates that the device may have a display that shows battery level and possibly other information related to the e-liquid. BOOST Mode: BOOST mode is a feature that allows you to activate a stronger and more powerful hit. Pressing the designated button activates this mode, enhancing the vapor production and nicotine delivery. Dual Mesh Coil: The dual mesh coil is a type of heating element in the device. Dual mesh coils are known for their ability to provide a larger surface area for heating, which can result in improved vapor production and flavor. Speaker Fabric Material: The use of speaker fabric material could refer to the material used for the device's exterior, resembling the fabric commonly used in speaker grills. This material choice might offer a unique aesthetic. Lightning Bolt Button Turns Device On/Off: The lightning bolt button serves as the power button, allowing you to turn the device on and off.
